title: Chic, Sweet, and Special: Gifts Perfect for Every Kind of Mom This Mother’s Day
description: From little luxuries to fancy treats, find presents for everyone on your list.
excerpt: From stylish Mother's Day treats to little luxuries for your wife, find the perfect gifts for women to unwrap here.
text: Eberjey Inez Washable Silk Short PJ SetEberjey makes some of the best pajamas around. The brand’s short sets are so chic there’s no need to ever get dressed.Éliou Chiara Pearl Choker NecklacePearl’s feel just right for Mother’s Day. This multi-layered set will win gift-giving season thanks to its adjustable choker design.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowCoach Brooklyn 28 Shoulder BagShe’ll always appreciate a designer bag. Coach’s Brooklyn bag is the one she can carry everyday.Printworks x Café Kitsuné Matcha Tools SetThe ritual of sipping on a cup of tea will bring some relaxation into each day, especially if it includes top-grade matcha like this one.Advertisement - Continue Reading Below1-800-Flowers Mother's Embrace Bouquet LargeA timeless gift that she’ll never get tired of is a classic bouquet. Order them in advance to avoid the day-of rush.Parima GiPlush Velvet Personalized Jewelry BoxThe jet-setters in your life will put this chic pouch to use. Add dimension to her wallet collection with this new offering from Gucci.Dr. Dennis Gross Skincare SpectraLite™ FaceWare Pro (1 piece)The ones who are loyal to their beauty routine will jump for joy when they unwrap this heroic skin-enhancing mask. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowTop Design Embroidery Initial Canvas ToteA custom gift is always a great idea, especially this chic black-and-white tote bag. You’ll earn bonus points if you fill it with her favorite snacks and beauty products.Arm-Protecting Garden Gloves [Medium]Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowTory Burch Cap-Toe SlingbackThe ballet flat trend continues. This time, it’s elevated with a slingback silhouette and a cap-toe finish.Carolin Gidiere Interiors for a Life in Good TasteThose who are inspired by fine interiors will enjoy flipping through this book of American designs coupled with expert-backed advice.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowHERMÉS Un Jardin sur le Nil - Eau de toiletteHere’s a sophisticated scent she can spritz on everyday. html:
Eberjey Inez Washable Silk Short PJ Set

Eberjey makes some of the best pajamas around. The brand’s short sets are so chic there’s no need to ever get dressed.

Éliou Chiara Pearl Choker Necklace

Pearl’s feel just right for Mother’s Day. This multi-layered set will win gift-giving season thanks to its adjustable choker design.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Coach Brooklyn 28 Shoulder Bag

She’ll always appreciate a designer bag. Coach’s Brooklyn bag is the one she can carry everyday.

Printworks x Café Kitsuné Matcha Tools Set

The ritual of sipping on a cup of tea will bring some relaxation into each day, especially if it includes top-grade matcha like this one.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

1-800-Flowers Mother's Embrace Bouquet Large

A timeless gift that she’ll never get tired of is a classic bouquet. Order them in advance to avoid the day-of rush.

Parima GiPlush Velvet Personalized Jewelry Box

The jet-setters in your life will put this chic pouch to use. It earns extra points thanks to the customizable initial.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Oscar de la Renta Embellished Cotton Jacket

Or you could skip the flowers and grab a jacket that’s a true garden party.

Maison Francis Kurkdjian Paris Baccarat Rouge 540 Eau de Parfum

There’s a reason why Maison Francis Kurkdjian’s Baccarat Rouge 540 fragrance is one of the number one bestsellers in the world. It has a universally flattering scent that works well on everyone.

Longchamp Large Le Pliage Panier Tote

Get her ready for the summer with a travel-ready bag that comes with woven details anchored with leather trimmings.

Dyson Airwrap

Whether she loves super smooth, straight strands or bouncy blowout curls, Dyson’s Airwrap makes it possible to achieve salon-worthy styles at home.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Gucci GG Emblem Mini Wallet

Whether you call it mint or pistachio, soft pastel greens are the color of the season. Add dimension to her wallet collection with this new offering from Gucci.

Dr. Dennis Gross Skincare SpectraLite™ FaceWare Pro (1 piece)

The ones who are loyal to their beauty routine will jump for joy when they unwrap this heroic skin-enhancing mask.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Top Design Embroidery Initial Canvas Tote

A custom gift is always a great idea, especially this chic black-and-white tote bag. You’ll earn bonus points if you fill it with her favorite snacks and beauty products.

Arm-Protecting Garden Gloves [Medium]

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Tory Burch Cap-Toe Slingback

The ballet flat trend continues. This time, it’s elevated with a slingback silhouette and a cap-toe finish.

Carolin Gidiere Interiors for a Life in Good Taste

Those who are inspired by fine interiors will enjoy flipping through this book of American designs coupled with expert-backed advice.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

HERMÉS Un Jardin sur le Nil - Eau de toilette

Here’s a sophisticated scent she can spritz on everyday. It includes sweet, refreshing citrus notes grounded with the scent of warm sycamore wood.

Williams Sonoma Pasta Starter Set

If she loves experimenting in the kitchen, this set will help her whip up homemade pasta.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Chloe x Lele Sadoughi Pinot Grigio

With a silken bow designed by Lele Sadoughi, this bottle of Chloe Pinot Grigio is ready to give to that special lady in your life.

Mejuri Lab Grown Sapphire Tennis Bracelet

Add a touch of sparkle to her wrist with Mejuri’s hypnotizing tennis bracelet.
